metadata.Title: CVE-2023-40477 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: RARLAB WinRAR Recovery Volume Improper Validation of Array Index RemoteCode Execution Vulnerability

criterions.comment: rar: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
unrar-nonfree: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libclamunrar: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
